text: Constructs a VDF scattering light for a participating medium.

Constructs a VDF for scattering light through a participating medium, based on the Henyey-Greenstein phase function. Forward, backward and uniform scattering is supported and controlled by the anisotropy input.
Absorption rate for the medium (rate per distance traveled in the medium, given in m−1). Set for each color component/wavelength separately. Default is (0, 0, 0).
Scattering rate for the medium (rate per distance traveled in the medium, given in m−1). Set for each color component/wavelength separately. Default is (0, 0, 0).

Anisotropy factor, controlling the scattering direction between -1.0 and 1.0. Negative values give backwards scattering, positive values give forward scattering, and a value of 0.0 (the default) gives uniform scattering.
